name: Cubey Clicker
description:
Cubey Clicker: Version PBet (public beta) 1.0

Yes! I made another game. This time, not really inspired by anything (except cookie clicker)

This game is in a very early development stage, so you might be surprised why I'm uploading this. The reason is because, why not? You shouldn't be refrained from playing a game at such an early stage. And since I'm probably not gonna be working on this much, I might as well upload updates quick and fast.

Okay, on with the actual description.

Thanks for reading this up until now! But anyways, this game is literally just a clicker. A boredom repellent (or maybe a boredom attractant). Yeah, I know. It's stupid. I don't know why I made this. It's so simple.
